Article.ArticleTitle: Coronavirus Disease Pathophysiology: Biomarkers, Potential New Remedies, Comorbidities, Long COVID-19, Post Pandemic Epidemiological Surveillance.

Abstract.AbstractText: The toughest challenge modern biomedical research ever faced was the rapid understanding of the SARS-CoV-2 physiopathology [...].
